name: Till Deaf
description:
From the Team that has brought you Archanpobia comes Till Deaf.

You play as a Mouse that has escaped from the Military that has been experimenting on various rodents for a secret weapon meant for world domination. Carefully navigate your way out of the sewers filled to the brim with Military drones.

Can you make it out? 

Controls:

WASD - To MOve

ESC - To bring up the pause menu (Use this when you die to go back to the menu)
